metadata.title_text: "Photographs from ""Tracking Memories"" by Mr. Kwek Leng Joo"
metadata.physical_appearance: The volume of photographs are all in black and white, except for one (2016-00498) which is in colour. The majority of the photographs depict railway trains, railroads, and the interior of Tanjong Pagar station.
